officialTitle: Case Series of Continuously-infused Amphotericin-B and Follow-up Voriconazole Therapy for Severe Blastomycosis Pulmonary Infections
inclusionCriteria:
* All adult patients 18 years of age or older admitted to the intensive care units of St. Boniface General Hospital with a diagnosis of acute pulmonary blastomycosis requiring mechanical ventilation.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria: * The patient's data will be excluded if they die within 3 days of hospital admission.
